links.*: The Lord of the Rings Online

wikitext.*:
'''Ashes''' were tall, straight, grey trees common in northern lands, and found throughout [[Middle-earth]]. The spears of the [[Rohirrim]] were made from their wood,<ref>{{TT|III2}}</ref> as was [[Gandalf]]'s staff. 
== Portrayal in adaptations ==
'''2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:Wood of the regular ash tree can be foraged by journeyman foresters in [[Ered Luin]], [[Bree-land]], the [[Barrow-downs]], and the [[North Downs]].<ref>{{LOTROW|Ash Branches|21 August 2025}}</ref> Wood of the black ash tree can be foraged by master foresters in the [[Misty Mountains]], [[Angmar]], and [[Eregion]].<ref>{{LOTROW|Black Ash Branches|21 August 2025}}</ref> Wood of the wind-swept black ash tree can be foraged by ''Gundabad'' foresters in the [[Ettenmoors]], [[Gundabad]], and King's [[Gondor]].<ref>{{LOTROW|Wind-swept Black Ash Branches|21 August 2025}}</ref> Wood of the wind-swept black ash tree can be foraged by ''Umbar'' foresters in the Ettenmoors, King's Gondor, and Outer Gondor.<ref>{{LOTROW|Wind-swept Black Ash Branches|21 August 2025}}</ref>
